File gm_layout.c
Fix fontsize calculation. This is now performed by gm_create_buttonbox everytime it is called but should be done only once. Preferrably only when the programs-button_box is calculated.

Be able to popup main menu when other apps have focus. This should probably be solved in the window manager used and not solved by gappman.
